ygData.subject: Re: (OT) Language Filter
ygData.msgSnippet: about this,  have they recently allowed periods and dashes to show up? I thought I noticed this a few times last night, haven t taken the time to test it
ygData.messageBody:
about this, have they recently allowed periods and dashes to show up? I
thought I noticed this a few times last night, haven't taken the time to
test it though.
----- Original Message -----
From: <chlebek@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 9:30 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] (OT) Language Filter


From: chlebek@...




> Is it just me, or has there been a new language filter implemented in the
> last few months? I've noticed it off an on since I got back - wasn't sure
> what I was seeing until I really started watching. Seems like most of
> George Carlin's "10 words" are now "censored" by being converted to
> "garbage" as though they were speaking a different language.
<< snip >>
> Talies the Wanderer
>
> "Vragnq server! I just got booted off the trheolw boat again!"


Yep, there's a filter now. There is also a /filter command that toggles it
on
and off.

Taelin
